00259 #if defined UINT64_MEMCMP
00260   #define IS_EQ_64BIT_VALUES(A, B) (0 == memcmp(&(A), &(B), sizeof(uint64_t)))
00261   #define IS_EQ_64BIT_VALUES_A(A, B) (0 == memcmp((A), (B), sizeof(uint64_t)))
00262   #define COPY_64BIT_VALUE(DST, SRC) __builtin_memcpy(&(DST), &(SRC), sizeof(uint64_t))
00263   #define COPY_64BIT_VALUE_A(DST, SRC) __builtin_memcpy((DST), (SRC), sizeof(uint64_t))
00264 #else
00265   #define IS_EQ_64BIT_VALUES(A, B) ((A) == (B))
00266   #define COPY_64BIT_VALUE(DST, SRC) (DST) = (SRC)
00267   #define IS_EQ_64BIT_VALUES_A(A, B) (0 == memcmp((A), (B), sizeof(uint64_t)))
00268   #define COPY_64BIT_VALUE_A(DST, SRC) memcpy((DST), (SRC), sizeof(uint64_t))
00269 #endif
